languages.text: "Да, однако с ней меня не связывает ничего, кроме имени". {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "Я покинул Гвизорн III еще ребенком. Моя семья отреклась от меня, лишив родового имени — новое я получил уже от своих наставников. Даже для дворянина клеймо {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g} — вечная отметка позора. Я успел почувствовать это на себе прежде, чем меня забрали на Черный корабль".

traits.locale_text: "Да, однако с ней меня не связывает ничего, кроме имени". {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "Я покинул Гвизорн III еще ребенком. Моя семья отреклась от меня, лишив родового имени — новое я получил уже от своих наставников. Даже для дворянина клеймо {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g} — вечная отметка позора. Я успел почувствовать это на себе прежде, чем меня забрали на Черный корабль".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."
languages.original_text: "Да, однако с ней меня не связывает ничего, кроме имени". {n}Хейнрикс морщится.{/n} "Я покинул Гвизорн III еще ребенком. Моя семья отреклась от меня, лишив родового имени — новое я получил уже от своих наставников. Даже для дворянина клеймо {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g} — вечная отметка позора. Я успел почувствовать это на себе прежде, чем меня забрали на Черный корабль".

traits.locale_text: "I do... but I'd prefer not to." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name. I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a psyker is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that firsthand, before I was put on the Black Ship."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."

My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我还记得，但除了我的名字之外，我和我的故乡已经没有任何联系了。”{n}海因里希的嘴角耷拉了下来。{/n}“我还是个孩子的时候，就离开了吉索恩三号星。我的家人与我断绝了关系，剥夺了我的姓氏，那些训练我的人赐予了我新的姓氏。即便是对贵族而言，一旦被打上了{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}的烙印，也会是永久的耻辱。我被送上黑船之前，曾亲身体会过这样的耻辱。”
languages.original_text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."

traits.locale_text: “我还记得，但除了我的名字之外，我和我的故乡已经没有任何联系了。”{n}海因里希的嘴角耷拉了下来。{/n}“我还是个孩子的时候，就离开了吉索恩三号星。我的家人与我断绝了关系，剥夺了我的姓氏，那些训练我的人赐予了我新的姓氏。即便是对贵族而言，一旦被打上了{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}的烙印，也会是永久的耻辱。我被送上黑船之前，曾亲身体会过这样的耻辱。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a psyker is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."

languages.text: «Sí, pero ya nada me vincula a mi mundo natal a excepción de mi nombre». {n}Los labios de Heinrix se curvan hacia abajo.{/n} «Dejé Guisorn III cuando aún era un niño. Mi familia me desheredó, lo que me arrebató el apellido, aunque mis adiestradores me proporcionaron otro más tarde. Incluso para un noble, ser un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} es una marca de deshonra eterna. Lo viví de primera mano antes de acabar en la Nave Negra».
languages.original_text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, pero ya nada me vincula a mi mundo natal a excepción de mi nombre». {n}Los labios de Heinrix se curvan hacia abajo.{/n} «Dejé Guisorn III cuando aún era un niño. Mi familia me desheredó, lo que me arrebató el apellido, aunque mis adiestradores me proporcionaron otro más tarde. Incluso para un noble, ser un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} es una marca de deshonra eterna. Lo viví de primera mano antes de acabar en la Nave Negra».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「そうさせてもらおう。だが、今の私には故郷の惑星とは何のつながりもない。名を除いてはな」{n}ハインリックスの口元が綻ぶ。{/n}「私はまだ子供のときにガイソーンIIIを離れた。家族から勘当され、家名を剥奪されたのだ。たとえ貴族であっても、{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}の烙印を押されることは永遠の恥辱だ。〈黒き御船〉に乗せられる前、私はそれを身をもって体験した」
languages.original_text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."

traits.locale_text: 「そうさせてもらおう。だが、今の私には故郷の惑星とは何のつながりもない。名を除いてはな」{n}ハインリックスの口元が綻ぶ。{/n}「私はまだ子供のときにガイソーンIIIを離れた。家族から勘当され、家名を剥奪されたのだ。たとえ貴族であっても、{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}の烙印を押されることは永遠の恥辱だ。〈黒き御船〉に乗せられる前、私はそれを身をもって体験した」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ja, doch ich habe keine Verbindung zu meiner Heimatwelt mehr, von meinem Vornamen abgesehen." {n}Heinrix' Mundwinkel verziehen sich nach unten.{/n} "Ich verließ Guisorn III, als ich noch ein Kind war. Meine Familie enterbte mich, entzog mir meinen Familiennamen — ich bekam von meinen Ausbildern einen neuen. Selbst für einen Adligen ist es ein ewiges Schandmal, als {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} gebrandmarkt zu werden. Das habe ich aus erster Hand erfahren, noch bevor ich auf das Schwarze Schiff gebracht wurde."
languages.original_text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, doch ich habe keine Verbindung zu meiner Heimatwelt mehr, von meinem Vornamen abgesehen." {n}Heinrix' Mundwinkel verziehen sich nach unten.{/n} "Ich verließ Guisorn III, als ich noch ein Kind war. Meine Familie enterbte mich, entzog mir meinen Familiennamen — ich bekam von meinen Ausbildern einen neuen. Selbst für einen Adligen ist es ein ewiges Schandmal, als {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} gebrandmarkt zu werden. Das habe ich aus erster Hand erfahren, noch bevor ich auf das Schwarze Schiff gebracht wurde."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Oui, mais en dehors de mon prénom, plus rien ne me rattache à mon monde. Je n'étais qu'un enfant quand j'ai quitté Guisorn III, {n}continue Heinrix avec un air sombre.{/n} J'ai été renié par ma famille, dépouillé de mon nom et affublé d'un nouveau patronyme par ceux qui m'ont formé. Il n'y a pas de plus grand déshonneur que d'être un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g}, même pour un noble. On me l'a bien fait comprendre avant même que je ne monte à bord du Vaisseau Noir. »
languages.original_text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, mais en dehors de mon prénom, plus rien ne me rattache à mon monde. Je n'étais qu'un enfant quand j'ai quitté Guisorn III, {n}continue Heinrix avec un air sombre.{/n} J'ai été renié par ma famille, dépouillé de mon nom et affublé d'un nouveau patronyme par ceux qui m'ont formé. Il n'y a pas de plus grand déshonneur que d'être un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g}, même pour un noble. On me l'a bien fait comprendre avant même que je ne monte à bord du Vaisseau Noir. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Hatırlıyorum da ismim dışında hiçbir bağım kalmadı artık." {n}Heinrix'in suratı asılıyor.{/n} "Guisorn III'ten ayrıldığımda daha çocuktum. Ailem reddetti, soyadım silindi... Eğitim sırasında yenisini verdiler. Soylu bile olsan... {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Ruhsezer{/g} diye yaftalanmanın utancı tarifsiz. Onu da Kara Gemi'ye binmeden önce bizzat tecrübe ettim."
languages.original_text: "I do, but I have no ties to my homeworld now, none except my first name." {n}Heinrix's mouth turns down.{/n} "I left Guisorn III when I was still a child. My family disowned me, stripping me of my family name — I was given a new one by those who trained me. Even for a noble, being branded a {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} is a mark of eternal shame. I experienced that first-hand, before I was put on the Black Ship."

traits.locale_text: "Hatırlıyorum da ismim dışında hiçbir bağım kalmadı artık." {n}Heinrix'in suratı asılıyor.{/n} "Guisorn III'ten çıktığımda daha çocuktum. Ailem reddetti, soyadım silindi... Eğitim sırasında yenisini verdiler. Soylu bile olsan... {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} diye yaftalanmanın utancı tarifsiz. Onu da Kara Gemi'ye binmeden önce, bizzat tecrübe ettim."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
